name: Tanuki Defusal Co.
description:
Movement - Left/Right Arrow keys, A/D
Jump - Z, Space, Up, or W
Quick Reset - R
Return to Hub - H

Jumping off a slope maintains your speed!
also you can walljump.

ALL MUSIC IS CURRENTLY A PLACEHOLDER, IT'S ALL BY BRANFLAKES!

You play as Jolt the Tanuki, a newbie employee at Tanuki Defusal Co. Your job is to defuse mysterious Time Bombs -- as in, bombs that blow up time itself -- by turning them into leaves, then bringing them back to HQ. If you fail your first time, no problem! the bombs' explosions will only send you back in time, so you can try again and again until you complete your job -- as far as everyone else is concerned -- first try!

also I made it so that any time you do optimal movement it plays the tony hawk trick sound and I find that quite ammusing
